product_name: Swiss Army Classic SD Silver Alox Pocket Knife
long_description: The Silver Alox dresses up the Classic SD pocket knife with a modern look. Elegantly designed and crafted for extended use, this light and compact knife is perfect for your keychain.
short_description: The Silver Alox dresses up the Classic SD pocket knife with a modern look. Elegantly designed and crafted for extended use, this light and compact knife is perfect for your keychain.
